cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 1385 miles ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: moving west to west-northwest and forecast to stay south of, and likely dissipate before reaching, the northern Leeward Islands/ Virgin Islands area
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: No landfall anticipated – system forecast to degenerate east of the Lesser Antilles

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Lesser Antilles (mainly islands south of 16°N) late weekend
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed (no station in table near St. Croix)
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-depression–scale winds expected to remain well south-east of St. Croix; only breezy conditions possible
weather_observation.rainfall: No significant rainfall forecast for St. Croix from this system
